tp:errors.tp:docstring: Error types defined by UPnP (most of those are useless, but whatever)

tp:error.name: Invalid Action
tp:error.tp:docstring: Raised when a requested action is not allowed from current context. replaces EUPNP_INVALID_ACTION

tp:error.name: Invalid Argument
tp:error.tp:docstring: Raised when one of the provided arguments is invalid. replaces EUPNP_INVALID_ARGS

tp:error.name: Invalid Instance
tp:error.tp:docstring: An instance identifier (ie. object path) passed as input argument doesn't exist or isn't appliquable to the requested action. replaces EUPNP_RCS_INVALID_INSTANCE_ID and EUPNP_AVT_INVALID_INSTANCE_ID

tp:error.name: Action Failed
tp:error.tp:docstring: Raised when a requested action did not succeed (whatever that means...) replaces EUPNP_ACTION_FAILED

tp:error.name: Action Cancelled
tp:error.tp:docstring: Raised when a requested action was cancelled before completion

tp:error.name: Timeout
tp:error.tp:docstring: Raised when a requested action's execution time goes beyond a predefined (context-dependent) timeout

tp:error.name: Arg Val Oor
tp:error.tp:deprecated: Error only used in deprecated method setObject replaced by playURI
